items.name: var family: CLKComplicationFamily
items.desc: The family to which the complication belongs.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: An identifier that specifies a complication if your app supports multiple complications per family.

items.name: var userActivity: NSUserActivity?
items.desc: An object that represents the state of the app at a moment in time.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of additional data associated with the complication.
